Test Name: Histoplasma and Blastomyces Antigen, Enzyme Immunoassay (Serum)
Purpose: To detect Histoplasma capsulatum and Blastomyces dermatitidis antigens in serum for the diagnosis of associated fungal infections.
Container: Serum collection tube (e.g., red-top or serum separator tube)
Equipment: EIA microplate reader, incubator (37 Â°C), microplate washer, calibrated micropipettes
